Two French journalists are back home after being held by the Taliban for 18 months.
Thousands of schools close across Britain as teachers and other public workers strike over pension reforms.
Protesters demand that Britain release Palestinian - Israeli leader Raed Salah, now being detained in the UK.
In India, police charge students protesting against police crackdowns on student demonstrations.
In Egypt, violence returns to Cairo as police clash with civilians in the streets.
In the Palestinian territories, students in Khan Younis develop a recycled race car.
